title: I wish Riot would just stop abusing E-Sports for like 2 months and start adressing other issues
body:
Like, for example:

- Bugs (Invisible fucking Nidalee spears are still here)
- Balance of champions
- New client
- Replay system
- New splash arts for skins
- New original skins for champs who need it
- Fixing IP gains/EXP gains for new players
- Fixing runes prices
- New original and balanced champions (not overloaded pieces of shit like {{champion:412}} )
- Visual Updates
- Fixing ping issues aka East Coast Servers

And the list goes on and on...

Seriously, I know League became a competitive game, but can you please give at least 50% of the effort you put on E-Sports in the game itself? There's like at most 100 people on E-sports, while there's like 10 millions people playing League of Legends.
